actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the National Trails System Act to require the establishment of interpretive sites for the Trail of Tears National Historic Trail.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to require the Secretary of the Interior to establish an interpretive site for the Trail of Tears National Historic Trail at each of the following locations: (1) Hopkinsville, Kentucky; (2) Fort Smith, Arkansas; (3) Trail of Tears State Park, Missouri; and (4) Tahlequah, Oklahoma.

titles.title: To amend the National Trails System Act to require the establishment of interpretive sites for the Trail of Tears National Historic Trail.
